TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Indexes implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 一对象值，该值代表指定文档中的所有索引。

span.span: A collection of objects that represents all the indexes in the specified document.

span.para: 使用方法，以创建索引，并将其添加到Indexes集合。
使用索引()，其中是要返回的单个Index对象的索引号。索引号代表文档中的Index对象的位置。
Use the property to return the Indexes collection.
Use the method to create an index and add it to the Indexes collection.
Use Indexes(), where is the index number, to return a single Index object. The index number represents the position of the Index object in the document.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Index Add (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, ref object HeadingSeparator, ref object RightAlignPageNumbers, ref object Type, ref object NumberOfColumns, ref object AccentedLetters, ref object SortBy, ref object IndexLanguage);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Index Add([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, [in]object& HeadingSeparator, [in]object& RightAlignPageNumbers, [in]object& Type, [in]object& NumberOfColumns, [in]object& AccentedLetters, [in]object& SortBy, [in]object& IndexLanguage) runtime managed

param.name: Range
param.span: 所需的Range对象。

span.span: Required Range object.

param.span: 要显示索引的区域。

span.span: The range where you want the index to appear.

param.span: 索引替换范围，如果该区域不折叠。

span.span: The index replaces the range, if the range isn't collapsed.

param.name: HeadingSeparator
param.span: 可选的对象。字母组 （以相同的字母开头的条目） 之间的文本索引中。

span.span: Optional Object.The text between alphabetic groups (entries that start with the same letter) in the index.

param.span: 可以是以下项之一常量： wdHeadingSeparatorBlankLine、 wdHeadingSeparatorLetter、 wdHeadingSeparatorLetterFull、 wdHeadingSeparatorLetterLow或wdHeadingSeparatorNone。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: wdHeadingSeparatorBlankLine, wdHeadingSeparatorLetter, wdHeadingSeparatorLetterFull, wdHeadingSeparatorLetterLow, or wdHeadingSeparatorNone.

param.name: RightAlignPageNumbers
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 为 页码与右边距对齐。

span.span: True to align page numbers with the right margin.

param.name: Type
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定子项是否作为主入口位于同一行 (接排式)，或者在单独的行 (缩进) 主入口。

span.span: Specifies whether subentries are on the same line (run-in) as the main entry or on a separate line (indented) from the main entry.

param.span: 可以是以下任一常量： wdIndexIndent或wdIndexRunin。

span.span: Can be either of the following constants: wdIndexIndent or wdIndexRunin.

param.name: NumberOfColumns
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 索引每页的列数。

span.span: The number of columns for each page of the index.

param.span: 指定为 0（零）会将索引中的列数设置为与文档中的列数相同的数。

span.span: Specifying 0 (zero) sets the number of columns in the index to the same number as in the document.

param.name: AccentedLetters
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果该属性值为 True，则在索引中包括单独用于重音字母的标题（例如，以“À”开头的单词与以“A”开头的单词将列在不同的标题下）。

span.span: True to include separate headings for accented letters in the index (for example, words that begin with "À" and words that begin with "A" are listed under separate headings).

param.name: SortBy
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要用于指定索引的排序准则。

span.span: The sorting criteria to be used for the specified index.

param.span: 可以是以下任一常量： wdIndexSortByStroke或wdIndexSortBySyllable。

span.span: Can be either of the following constants: wdIndexSortByStroke or wdIndexSortBySyllable.

param.name: IndexLanguage
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要用于指定索引的排序语言。

span.span: The sorting language to be used for the specified index.

param.span: 可以是任意常量。

span.span: Can be any of the constants.

summary.span: 返回代表添加到文档的新索引的对象。

span.span: Returns a object that represents a new index added to a document.

span.para: 从文档中的索引项 (XE) 字段建立索引。使用标记包含在索引中的索引项的方法。
An index is built from Index Entry (XE) fields in a document. Use the method to mark index entries to be included in an index.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Index AddOld (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, ref object HeadingSeparator, ref object RightAlignPageNumbers, ref object Type, ref object NumberOfColumns, ref object AccentedLetters);

span.span: Reserved for internal use.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AutoMarkEntries (string ConcordanceFileName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AutoMarkEntries([in]string ConcordanceFileName) runtime managed
Public Sub AutoMarkEntries (ConcordanceFileName As String)
public: void AutoMarkEntries(System::String ^ ConcordanceFileName);

param.name: ConcordanceFileName
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 包含要索引项目列表的对应文件名称。

span.span: The concordance file name that includes a list of items to be indexed.

summary.span: 用对应文件中的索引项将 XE（索引项）域自动添至指定文档。

span.span: Automatically adds XE (Index Entry) fields to the specified document, using the entries from a concordance file.

span.para: 索引文件是包含两列的表格，其中索引中的第二列中的第一列和索引条目 Microsoft Word 文档。
A concordance file is a Microsoft Word document that contains a two-column table, with terms to index in the first column and index entries in the second column.

public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 指定集合中返回的项目数。

span.span: Returns the number of items in the specified collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
例如，如果 Microsoft Word 中创建对象，此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: For example, if the object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.

span.span: Returns or sets the formatting for the indexes in the specified document.

span.para: The Format property can be one of the constants.

MemberSignature.Value: public void MarkAllEntries (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, ref object Entry, ref object EntryAutoText, ref object CrossReference, ref object CrossReferenceAutoText, ref object BookmarkName, ref object Bold, ref object Italic);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void MarkAllEntries([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, [in]object& Entry, [in]object& EntryAutoText, [in]object& CrossReference, [in]object& CrossReferenceAutoText, [in]object& BookmarkName, [in]object& Bold, [in]object& Italic) runtime managed

param.name: Range
param.span: 所需的Range对象。

span.span: Required Range object.

param.span: 其文字在整篇文档中用 XE 域标记的区域。

span.span: The range whose text is marked with an XE field throughout the document.

param.name: Entry
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要在索引中，窗体中显示的文本。

span.span: The text you want to appear in the index, in the form .

param.name: EntryAutoText
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要显示在索引中包含的文本自动图文集词条 (如果指定此参数，则，则忽略)。

span.span: The AutoText entry that contains the text you want to appear in the index (if this argument is specified, is ignored).

param.name: CrossReference
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要显示在索引中的交叉引用。

span.span: A cross-reference that will appear in the index.

param.name: CrossReferenceAutoText
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 包含交叉引用文本的自动图文集词条的名称 (如果指定此参数，则，则忽略)。

span.span: The name of the AutoText entry that contains the text for a cross-reference (if this argument is specified, is ignored).

param.name: BookmarkName
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 标记要在索引中显示的页码范围的书签名。

span.span: The bookmark name that marks the range of pages you want to appear in the index.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，则在索引中显示包含 XE 域的页面的页码。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the number of the page that contains the XE field appears in the index.

param.name: Bold
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 为 加粗格式添至索引项页码。

span.span: True to add bold formatting to page numbers for index entries.

param.name: Italic
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真 要斜体格式添至索引项页码。

span.span: True to add italic formatting to page numbers for index entries.

summary.span: 中的文本的所有实例后插入 XE （索引项） 域。

span.span: Inserts an XE (Index Entry) field after all instances of the text in .

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Field MarkEntry (Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, ref object Entry, ref object EntryAutoText, ref object CrossReference, ref object CrossReferenceAutoText, ref object BookmarkName, ref object Bold, ref object Italic, ref object Reading);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Field MarkEntry([in]class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Range Range, [in]object& Entry, [in]object& EntryAutoText, [in]object& CrossReference, [in]object& CrossReferenceAutoText, [in]object& BookmarkName, [in]object& Bold, [in]object& Italic, [in]object& Reading) runtime managed

param.name: Range
param.span: 所需的Range对象。

span.span: Required Range object.

param.span: 该项的位置。

span.span: The location of the entry.

param.span: 之后插入 XE 域的。

span.span: The XE field is inserted after .

param.name: Entry
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 在索引中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears in the index.

param.span: 要指示次索引项，则要包括主索引项文本和次索引项文本，其间用冒号 (:) 隔开（例如，"Introduction:The Product"）。

span.span: To indicate a subentry, include the main entry text and the subentry text, separated by a colon (:) (for example, "Introduction:The Product").

param.name: EntryAutoText
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 包含索引、 图表目录或目录的文本的自动图文集词条名称 ( ，则忽略)。

span.span: The AutoText entry name that includes text for the index, table of figures, or table of contents ( is ignored).

param.name: CrossReference
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 将出现在索引中的交叉引用（例如，“See Apples”）。

span.span: A cross-reference that will appear in the index (for example, "See Apples").

param.name: CrossReferenceAutoText
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 包含交叉引用文本的自动图文集词条名称 ( ，则忽略)。

span.span: The AutoText entry name that contains the text for a cross-reference ( is ignored).

param.name: BookmarkName
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 要显示在索引中的书签标记的页面范围的名称。

span.span: The name of the bookmark that marks the range of pages you want to appear in the index.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则在索引中出现包含 XE 域页。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the number of the page containing the XE field appears in the index.

param.name: Bold
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果该参数值为 True，则为索引中的词条页码设置加粗格式。

span.span: True to add bold formatting to the entry page numbers in the index.

param.name: Italic
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果该参数值为 True，则为索引中的词条页码设置倾斜格式。

span.span: True to add italic formatting to the entry page numbers in the index.

param.name: Reading
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果该参数值为 True，则当按发音排序索引时（仅用于中文）在右侧显示索引项。

span.span: True shows an index entry in the right location when indexes are sorted phonetically (East Asian languages only).

summary.span: 在指定区域后插入 XE （索引项） 域。

span.span: Inserts an XE (Index Entry) field after the specified range.

summary.span: 返回对象，代表 XE 域。

span.span: Returns a object representing the XE field.
